short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool to build a mosaic photo wall

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool can quickly build a mosaic photo wall and customize the export size

How to use it?
1. After installation, click the plug-in icon to open the operation interface.
2. Prepare at least one base map, one or more embedded photos, and configure relevant parameters. You can first click the Preview button to see the effect, and then click the Export button.

Warn: When configuring the export resolution, you need to consider the performance of your computer
